@tonyannett You might want to double-check what you cite. Austria  gets 65% of their power from hydro (https://t.co/C2r6WaSbsI). Sweden as I said in our dialogue gets 74% from hydro/nuclear. The majority of Portugal's energy relies on coal, gas, and hydro. There's a transition, not rapid.
